title: ReDownloading Game -- need help please
body:
Hi League Community,

So I took 2 years away from this game, I downloaded it again last Fall, but haven't touched it since. The new client (looks nice) is at at 13% after 3 and half hours of downloading. I restarted after 25 minutes running it through LeagueAdmin because the speeds were crazy low. 

It claims 13% running 2522.8MB / 60.2 KBps
ETA 717 mins 
(which is a longer ETA from when I started)

My internet is averaging 64MBps dl and 5.8MBps upload speed
My PC is a MSI 12gb RAM  ---  i7 4700  ---  HD graphics intel 4600 and a Nvidia 765 4gb

I really don't want to wait 12 hours to download a game. I'm an adult with children and a job that just wanted to pla a quick few with friends across the country.  

Any solutions out there? I've been searching for an hour now. 

it now is claimng 1% 570mins rasing to 606 and so on.  please help. why wont it download?

replies.body:
Welcome back to League of Legends! Excited to have you here, but not excited to hear about he current issues you're dealing with. Sounds like something is blocking the client from download, so what i'm going to have you do is work through our [Permissions Guide first](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104). I believe this will get you downloading at faster speeds and back into the game. If it doesn't however make sure to reach back out to me for help :) 
{{champion:25}}
You could always try looking up troubleshooting tips but honestly with the two years you've been gone + the new client update it will definitely take some time. I would just wait it out.
Thank you for advice. It's restarted on it's own 3 times now in the last hour.  Riot seems to not want me to play. :( it's why amumu cries {{champion:32}}

u could try closing out of league and then going into your files from 'This PC > OS (C:) > Riot Games > League of Legends > RADS > projects' and try to delete "lol patcher" and then restart league, which would restart the patch but might fix your problem of it restarting over and over again.  no promises tho, waiting it out is always still an option.
